means: （清真寺旁由报告祈祷时刻的人使用的）光塔

sentence.Network_en: The minaret is 65 meters ( 213 feet ) high, the second highest in the world.
sentence.Network_cn: 光塔高65米 ( 213英尺 ),高度位居世界第二.

sentence.Network_en: It stands on a high marble plinth with a minaret at each corner.
sentence.Network_cn: 整个建筑建立在一个高大的大理石底座上，每个角上都有一个尖塔。

sentence.Network_en: Wen is the minaret of the ancient town of Chaoyang mark.
sentence.Network_cn: 文光塔是古邑潮阳的标志.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 阿拉伯语手册6 - nizi73224的日志 - 网易博客 ... 清真寺 mosque 尖塔 minaret 教堂 church.
宣礼塔（Minaret）：清真寺中呼唤信徒礼拜的高塔。
GRE英语单词分类总结 - 豆丁网 ... steeple n. 尖塔，尖阁 minaret n. 叫拜楼（伊斯兰教寺院的尖塔） pinnacle n. 尖塔，山峰.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... mime 哑剧表演；哑剧(演员) minaret 清真寺的尖塔 minatory 威胁的，恫吓的.

list.abs: Hagia Sophia is the great architectural landmark at the heart of Istanbul , with its four minarets poised like moon-bound rockets .位于伊斯坦布尔市中心的海依牙·索非亚教堂是地标性的伟大建筑，它的四座光塔耸立着，象要呼啸飞往月球的火箭。
they told archaeologists from Kocaeli University and the Istanbul Prehistoric Research Project that they thought it was the minaret of a sunken mosque .他们告诉考古学家从科贾埃利大学和伊斯坦布尔史前研究项目，他们认为这是一个凹陷的尖塔的清真寺。
king Mohammed of Morocco has ordered structural examinations of all the country's ancient mosques after a minaret collapsed , killing 41 people .摩洛哥一座尖塔坍塌之后，国王默罕默德下令对国内所有的古清真寺进行结构检查。

Abdul Qassim Sadr , assistant director of the hospital emergency room , said he heard a huge explosion and saw fire and smoke rising between two minarets .医院急诊室副主任阿比杜尔·卡西姆·萨德尔说，他听到一声巨响，看见有烟火从两个尖塔之间冒出来。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from French, or from Spanish minarete, Italian minaretto, via Turkish from Arabic manār(a) 'lighthouse, minaret', based on nār 'fire or light'

entry.def: A minaret is a tall thin tower which is part of a mosque.

auth_sentence.content: One video shows snipers on the minaret of a mosque.
auth_sentence.res_content: One video shows snipers on the minaret of a mosque.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One video shows snipers on the minaret of a mosque.

auth_sentence.content: Polls before the referendum indicated voters would reject the minaret ban proposal.
auth_sentence.res_content: Polls before the referendum indicated voters would reject the minaret ban proposal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Polls before the referendum indicated voters would reject the minaret ban proposal.

auth_sentence.content: I do not want to see a twenty-four-metre minaret in the landscape of Giotto.
auth_sentence.res_content: I do not want to see a twenty-four-metre minaret in the landscape of Giotto.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I do not want to see a twenty-four-metre minaret in the landscape of Giotto.
